display_long_description:
Step into the world of disc golf like never before with Disc Golf: Hyzer Flip! This VR disc golf simulator will immerse you in a thrilling experience full of exciting and challenging games and courses. Customize the discs in your bag and play stroke play on custom or procedurally generated courses. Compete with your friends in multiplayer and see who can get the disc in the basket in as few strokes as possible.

Challenge your friends or play a solo round in the stroke play game mode, which follows classic golf rules. The custom courses included range from beginner-friendly to challenging, with each offering its own unique style. The procedurally generated courses offer unlimited replay-ability and a new challenge every round! The replay feature allows you to view your throws from different angles to improve your technique and dial in your putting. Experience all your best shots and aces from the best angles.

Test your accuracy and consistency in the fast-paced putting challenge mini-game. Putt until you miss, and you will move further back every three putts you make. Try to beat your personal high score, or challenge your friends!

Disc Golf: Hyzer Flip is a must-play for anyone looking for a thrilling VR experience. Whether you're a casual gamer or a disc golf enthusiast, this unique and exciting game will continually challenge you and your friends. Join the fun and start throwing!
